title: Vegetation Patch Feature
description: Feature type `minecraft:vegetation_patch_feature` has not yet been documented.

replaceable_blocks.title: Replaceable Blocks
replaceable_blocks.description: Blocks that can be replaced by the ground blocks on the patch.

ground_block.title: Ground Block
ground_block.description: Block used to create a base for the vegetation patch.

vegetation_feature.title: Vegetation Feature
vegetation_feature.description: Feature that will be placed by the patch.

surface.title: Surface
surface.description: Determines if a vegetation patch will grow from the ceiling or the floor.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Depth of the base covered by the ground blocks.

extra_deep_block_chance.title: Extra Deep Block Chance
extra_deep_block_chance.description: Probability of putting the ground blocks one block deeper. Adds some randomness to the bottom of the patch.

vertical_range.title: Vertical Range
vertical_range.description: Vertical range used to determine a suitable surface position for the patch.

vegetation_chance.title: Vegatation Chance
vegetation_chance.description: Probability of spawning vegetation on the patch. Larger numbers create a denser vegetation patch.

horizontal_radius.title: Horizontal Radius
horizontal_radius.description: Horizontal area that the vegetation patch will cover.

extra_edge_column_chance.title: Extra Egde Column Chance
extra_edge_column_chance.description: Probability of spawning vegetation on the edge of the patch radius.

waterlogged.title: Waterlogged
waterlogged.description: If true, waterlogs the positions occupied by the ground blocks.
